# gestureRecognizerForExclusionRelationship

**Instance Property**

A gesture recognizer that you can use to set up simultaneous recognition or failure relationships with other gesture recognizers.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var gestureRecognizerForExclusionRelationship: UIGestureRecognizer { get }
```

## Customizing large content viewer interactions

- **delegate**: An object that can fine-tune the large content viewer interactions, especially in the presence of other gesture recognizers.
